snippet.title: Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow - Teaser Trailer (SteamVR)
snippet.description:
A Got Bacon Games Production created by Graham Jones.

Emiline: The Ghost of White Willow is a psychological horror VR game. Taking place during the events of D-day, find yourself trapped in the gothic horrors of White Willow Manor Hall. Follow your sections lieutenant into combat before fighting a new battle of survival in the dark haunted past of the house.

Find it on the Steam Store and keep up to date at the games website at emiline.got-bacon.co.uk
